t: Amazon Is Getting Into Sportswear - Bloomberg
s: October 14, 2017 - Amazon.com Inc. is tapping some of the biggest athletic-apparel suppliers to make a foray into private-label sportswear, according to people familiar with the matter, setting the stage for further upheaval in an already-tumultuous industry.
